meanings.sent1: The uncooked vegetables were crunchy and fresh.
meanings.sent2: I prefer uncooked fruits for a healthy snack.
meanings.sent3: The uncooked pasta tried to escape from the boiling water!
meanings.sent4: Her uncooked talent shone brightly in the audition.
meanings.sent5: The uncooked meat smelled raw and unappetizing.

meanings.sent1: The uncooked dough was sticky and soft.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the uncooked cookie dough more than the baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The uncooked cake batter looked like a colorful painting.
meanings.sent4: His uncooked enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The uncooked clay felt cool and moldable in her hands.
